name: Takoyaki
story: Crispy octopus-filled balls from Osaka, Japan — a street food icon.
local_version: Use paneer cubes instead of octopus and cook in appe pan.

name: Arepas
story: Cornmeal patties stuffed with cheese, beans or meat — soft and crisp!
local_version: Use makki atta with paneer or rajma as filling.

name: Gimbap
story: Korean rice rolls wrapped in seaweed, filled with veggies or egg.
local_version: Use roti strips to wrap rice + sabzi mix.
